mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.* FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_role_user ru ON ru.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ru.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_acl ra ON ra.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_acl a ON ra.acl_id = a.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND r.status = '1' AND a.status = '1';
select count(*) from sys_acl where (acl_module_id = #{sysAclDto.aclModuleId} and name = #{sysAclDto.name}) or (acl_module_id = #{sysAclDto.aclModuleId} and seq = #{sysAclDto.seq});
SELECT u.id, u.username FROM sys_role_acl ra JOIN sys_role r ON ra.role_id = r.id JOIN sys_role_user ru ON r.id = ru.role_id JOIN sys_user u ON ru.user_id = u.id WHERE ra.acl_id = #{aclId};
SELECT r.name FROM sys_role_acl ra JOIN sys_role r ON ra.role_id = r.id WHERE ra.acl_id = #{aclId};

SELECT DISTINCT a.* FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_role_user ru ON ru.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ru.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_acl ra ON ra.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_acl a ON ra.acl_id = a.id WHERE u.username = #{username} AND r.status = '1' AND a.status = '1';
